Articles.Content: Each time I record gameplay videos with quicktime player, the gui and the loaded spacecraft disappears and reappears all the time. It makes a flashing effect which makes the video nearly unwatchable. Maybe I need another recording software? Mind giving me any suggestions or help?
VLC might do it if you have Snow Leopard (10.6) or below, I tried it today and apparently it doesn't work on 10.7 or 10.8.
